channel.title: Dedicated servers - On their way!
channel.description:
I've been investigating awesome Dedicated servers, for Runescape Private Servers. So far, I am hoping to get these two servers.
Nehalem EX E5570 2.93 GHz 6.4 GT/s 1333 MHz 32 GB/s
and
Dual Intel Quadcore 5420 CPUs 12GB Ram, 2x500GB SATA Drives Unlimited Bandwidth [100Mbit Port]
My investment into the community will surely not go un-heard. I'm currently also investigating into certain Servers that I think would have a exponential spurt of growth if using a Dedicated Server.
I'd love for people to post and recommend what Servers and the Server Owners I should contact and offer a deal to.
There's only one thing I wouldn't like -
To offer me some leeched, half assed, server. Please offer me genuine servers only!

item.title: Dedicated servers - On their way!
item.dc:creator: @cdoggy cdoggy
item.description:
@cdoggy wrote:

I’m actually looking for servers for my self to expand. Let me know if your interested in selling me a server.

Read full topic

item.title: Dedicated servers - On their way!
item.dc:creator: @dharok1337 dharok1337
item.description:
@dharok1337 wrote:

It’s a possibility, you could offer them a Website, and I will set the up with a Server

I just need to find a awesome server. I’ve recently been interested in Alcyoneus Revolution

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic

item.title: Dedicated servers - On their way!
item.dc:creator: @cdoggy cdoggy
item.description:
@cdoggy wrote:

Would you like to team up with my company and see if we can’t offer a free website too? Sort of a sponsorship? I own Green River Web Hosts, a web hosting company. Http://grwh.net Let me know what you think.

Read full topic

item.title: Dedicated servers - On their way!
item.dc:creator: @dharok1337 dharok1337
item.description:
@dharok1337 wrote:

I wouldn’t see a problem with that, if I am giving out a spot to someone who can thoroughly code a nice Runescape server, then there really shouldn’t be a problem needing any type of support unless there’s something you need that only the hosting company can do themselves.

Read full topic

item.title: Dedicated servers - On their way!
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

[quote=“dharok1337, post:4, topic:323392”]You do understand that Nehalem EX E5570 are Xeon right?

These servers would be given out free to people developing a great server, or the ability to purchase them monthly would be around 90% of savings.[/quote]

Sorry, didn’t realise :P.

Would still be a bit concerned about the lack of 24/7 support.

Read full topic

item.title: Dedicated servers - On their way!

item.title: Dedicated servers - On their way!
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:2, topic:323392”]You’re asking for suggestions on a server source?..

(not a rhetorical or sarcastic question)[/quote]

I think he’s saying that he is offering his dedicated servers to anyone who wants to use them, for a price.

I’d rather go with a large company with 24/7 support and Xeon servers.

Read full topic
